name: Generator Rex: Agent of Providence
description:
• Become Rex and mutate into 9 different builds like Slam Cannon, Rex Ride and Boogie Pack!
• Accept Agent Six’s missions, fight with Bobo Haha and uncover collectibles for Doc Holiday!
• Explore 11 different environments and hidden areas to evolve your powers!
• Fight through the depths of the jungle, the scorching deserts and the heart of metropolitan cities!
